column2: My hard work will not have gone unnoticed by my liege [target_liege.GetTitledName]. I am worthy of a position on the council and it's time I let [target_liege.GetHerHim] know.

[aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] expresses [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHis] wish to have a seat on the Council. [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHisCap] contribution to the realm is significant and [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHis] military strength is not to be ignored, so including [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim] in the Council may eliminate a potential future threat.
It has been long enough since [target_liege.GetTitledName] promised to make room for me on the council. I could remind [target_liege.GetHerHim] to keep [target_liege.GetHerHis] promise.
My request to join the [target_liege.GetCouncilName] of [target_liege.GetTitledName] will be considered.
The answer regarding a position on the [target_liege.GetCouncilName] of [target_liege.GetTitledName] was a definite no.

Although I didn't get a council position, I can rest assured that [target_liege.GetTitledName] knows I'm competent. In fact, [target_liege.GetSheHe] said that a council position would be a waste of my precious time.

[target_liege.GetTitledName] told me that [councillor_target.GetTitledName] has been slandering me! Of course my wise liege did not believe these lies, but the other councillors are worried, making it hard to give me a council position right now.
Your vassal, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], is concerned about [FromFrom.GetHerHis] non-inheriting sons. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] asks you to consider them when looking for new vassals.
Your vassal, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], is concerned about [FromFrom.GetHerHis] non-inheriting daughters. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] asks you to consider them when looking for new vassals.
My humble request to gain land for [chosen_child.GetFirstName] was successful. I no longer have to worry about him.
My humble request to gain land for [chosen_child.GetFirstName] was successful. I no longer have to worry about [chosen_child.GetHerHim].
Unfortunately, my Liege could not find it in [From.GetHerHis] heart to give my son any land at this time.
Unfortunately, my Liege could not find it in [From.GetHerHis] heart to give my [chosen_child.GetSonDaughter] any land at this time.
My son [chosen_child.GetFirstName] will now have his own land! My Liege made sure to mention that I should remember this in the future when [From.GetSheHe] requires a favor in return.

My [chosen_child.GetSonDaughter] [chosen_child.GetFirstName] will now have [chosen_child.GetHerHis] own land! My Liege made sure to mention that I should remember this in the future when [From.GetSheHe] requires a favor in return.
What would be a suitable position for [moving_councillor.GetTitledName] on the Council?

The request of [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] for a Council position has been postponed long enough. [aspiring_councillor.GetSheHeCap] thinks it is questionable that [councillor_target.GetTitledFirstName] is allowed on the Council when [aspiring_councillor.GetSheHe] isn't.

The request of [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] for a Council seat has been postponed long enough. Considering there is an open position, now would be the time to invite [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim].
Time to move on up.
I'll see what I can do.
I'll be on the council in no time!
Yes, it's time for a change.
Good news.
What a shame.
I'm great.
That snake!
I could use more good men.
I could use more good women.
Great!
Maybe next time.
Blessed be [From.GetHerHis] name.
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetChancellorName].
When [Root.GetRandomGodName] smiles on me, I will get my seat.
We don't need you.
[target_liege.GetSheHeCap] probably has a good reason for delaying.
Welcome [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim] to the Council.
I can't give out land to anyone who asks.
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetMarshalName].
I would not bother you with such petty assignments.
The council is for important people.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] will remember this generosity.
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetTreasurerName].
Make up stories of slander by [councillor_target.GetTitledFirstName].
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetSpymasterName].
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName].
I've changed my mind.
No, I had something else in mind.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should be my Advisor.
Asked for a council position.
Remind [target_liege.GetTitledName] of [target_liege.GetHerHis] promise.
Knows there is hope.
Is let down.
Is flattered.
[aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] is angered.
